question: You have a Facebook friend living in another country and s/he is curious to learn about a major news item in your country. Write a letter to your Facebook friend. In your letter 1. describe a news story in your country explain why people are interested in it. 2. say how the story personally relates to you. You do NOT need to write any addresses. Begin your letter as follows: Dear ..., You should write at least 150 words.
text: It has been a long time since being out of touch with you. I hope you are well. I write this letter in regards to the story that you asked me very before about a news item in my country. Luckily, I recently read an impressive article about an attractive place in our country where many legends originated.

The place is Tibet, and the adventure story is about the exploration of Tibet. I am sure you must have heard of this mysterious place many times. However, I am also certain that you don't know it very well. This story tells the experience of the first man who climbs the Moutain Everest, the highest peak on the earth. Therefore, I can confidently say you will enjoy the adventure experience very much.
Also, do you know that I was born in Tibet? I think you must be surprised by this fact. I choose this story because I want to introduce my hometown to you. I really hope you will enjoy it.
